prompt: Create an enchanting fantasy scene set in a mysterious swamp. The rare Swamp Spell, 'Eldritch Mist,' should feature an eerie mist glowing with ethereal light, winding through ancient, gnarled trees. The mist should be infused with mystical symbols shimmering in the air. The flora in the scene should include luminescent plants and glowing fungi, casting an unearthly light on the surroundings. The water should reflect the glow of the mist, adding an otherworldly ambience to the scene. The art should have a dark yet vibrant color palette, emphasizing the magical and mysterious nature of the swamp.
